data.name: Noble Knight Peredur
data.desc: While equipped with a "Noble Arms" Equip Spell Card, this card becomes DARK and its Level is increased by 1. If this card is sent to the Graveyard while equipped with a "Noble Arms" Equip Spell Card: Target 1 "Noble Arms" card in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.

card_sets.set_name: Noble Knights of the Round Table Box Set
